quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易将"oort"误联想为"orbit"（轨道），从而把"oort cloud"理解为"轨道周围的云状结构"，或直接按字面译为"外层云"而忽略其天文学特定含义。
quiz_item.sentence: Astronomers believe the **Oort Cloud**, a vast sphere of icy objects beyond Neptune, is where most long-period comets originate before entering the inner solar system.
